DOC.brief_summary: Randomized control trial electronic cigarette nicotine , without nicotine , sham control , sympathetic nerve activity marker oxidative stress .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants use electronic cigarette 3 occasion : 1 ) nicotine , 2 ) without nicotine , 3 ) sham control , measure autonomic tone , include heart rate variability ( HRV ) sympathetic nerve activity ( MSNA : microneurography ) , oxidative stress measure pre post exposure .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Cardiac disease Respiratory disease Diabetes mellitus
